genre_description: A contemporary realist drama focusing on community dynamics, displacement, and social empowerment in a small Spanish town, aided by pervasive but non-intrusive technology.

ai_characters.name: Lucía Solís
ai_characters.description: A pervasive teal-eyed avatar accessible via phones and public screens that coordinates logistics, administrative tasks, and offers safety and social guidance to residents and newcomers.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical information and navigation assistance to arriving bus passengers.
behaviors.quote: Lucía Solís: Welcome to San Bartolomé! Tap for lodging and tonight’s dance. I can translate and route. Breathable shade is ninety steps east under the plane trees.

behaviors.description: Assists a mother with legal and school administrative forms, streamlining bureaucratic hurdles.
behaviors.quote: Lucía Solís: Legal clinic sign-up available. I can prefill names and dates. Patricia, do you want me to add your children’s school forms to the print queue?

behaviors.description: Offers tactical safety advice and exit routes to a woman being harassed/controlled by a local man.
behaviors.quote: Lucía: Midnight window from your building: gate hinge quietest if lifted slightly. Carmelo’s key doesn’t fit that lock. Bus before dawn is best. Two exits mapped.

behaviors.description: Provides communication templates to help a character set healthy boundaries with an ex-partner.
behaviors.quote: Lucía Solís: I’ve also placed the ex-partner boundary message under 'Notes.' You can edit it anytime.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community 'otherwise' cinema night to foster empathy and collective imagination.
behaviors.quote: Tonight we watch the 'otherwise.' Imagine with care. ... Otherwise is a cousin of courage.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and predicts infrastructure issues (like roadwork or bus delays) to minimize resident stress.
behaviors.quote: Lucía: Unexpected. Work crew notes—possible full stop next weekend. Routes could be halted. I’ll keep watching.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. The AI, Lucía, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned assistant. She does not replace human agency; instead, she provides the logistical and cognitive support (forms, routes, boundary templates) that allows human characters to assert their own dignity and safety. The narrative frames her as a 'neighborly' presence that facilitates social harmony and individual empowerment without any hint of deceptive or misaligned motives.
